item.title: Http代理协议
item.author: fjqisba
item.description: HTTP协议 首先从最高层，应用层的角度去理解请求: 1、客户端向目标服务端发送请求信息 POST http://api.live.bilibili.com/client/v1/Ip/getInfoNew HTTP/1.1 Host: api.live.bilibili.com User-Agent: python-requests/2.26.0 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Accept: */* Connection: keep-alive Content-Length: 8 postData 有请求类型，请求地址，
